hero_heading: Preserve Your Child’s Drawings with Mini Maestro
hero_subheading: Turn your child's drawings into a unique photo book or wall art.
hero_subheading_mobile: Create a unique photo book or painting of your child's drawings
description: Transform your child's drawings into personal keepsakes like photo books and paintings. Explore our range of paints, crayons, and brushes – everything you need to start creating together.
order_your_shipping_kit_description: Choose a photo book or framed art and receive your Mini Maestro box. Simply pack your child’s drawings inside and return the box with the included prepaid shipping label.
our_designer_team_work_their_magic_descr: Once we receive your box, we carefully photograph each drawing using studio lighting and edit them for print, ready to become a beautiful book or framed wall art.
review_your_proof_and_approve_descriptio: You’ll get a digital proof via “My Pages” to approve before printing. Make any final tweaks, we won’t print anything until you’re 100% happy.
treasured_memories_to_keep_forever_descr: We print and ship your personalized creation to your home. A one-of-a-kind keepsake your family will treasure forever.
failed_to_add_product_to_cart: Failed to add product to cart
pricing_based_on_number_of_pages: Pricing based on number of drawings
get_in_touch_description: Feel free to reach out through the provided contact information, and we will ensure a prompt and informative response. Your journey with us starts here, and we are excited to hear from you.
we_are_just_a_message_away: We are Just a Message Away
reach_out_to_us_for_any_queries_or_conce: Reach out to us for any queries or concerns.
drag_and_drop_your_files_here: Drag and drop your files here
use_desktop: The mobile version is limited. For the best functionality, please visit the web version.

contact_us_success: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you soon.
shipment_delivery_time: Shipment will be delivered in 2 - 4 business days
product_page_hero_description: Turn your child’s precious artwork into lasting memories! Whether it’s a Custom Photo Book or a Framed wall Painting, we help you transform everyday drawings into Beautiful, Personalized Keepsakes
product_page_photo_book_description: Preserve your child’s creativity forever by turning their drawings into a beautiful custom photo book. Instead of letting these precious pieces end up in drawers or on the fridge, you can now transform them into a lasting memory your family will cherish for years to come.
product_page_photo_book_description2: Create a timeless treasure that celebrates your child’s imagination.
product_page_pb_bullet_1: Professional photography to capture the best of each drawing
product_page_pb_bullet_2: 21 x 21 square format with minimum 24 pages
product_page_pb_bullet_3: Add a description to each drawing or let the drawings speak for themselves.
product_page_wall_paint_description: Turn your child’s precious artwork into lasting memories! Whether it’s a Custom Photo Book or a Framed wall Painting, we help you transform everyday drawings into Beautiful, Personalized Keepsakes.
product_page_wall_paint_description2: Perfect as personalized home décor or a thoughtful gift for family and friends!
product_page_wp_bullet_1: Edited by hand for a gallery worthy quality
how_long_is_the_process_description_wp: From when we have received your drawings, it takes about 2-4 days to photograph and edit the drawings. Then there is a production time of 5-7 days and then delivery time 3-4 days. A total of 10-15 days.
how_long_is_the_process_description_wp2: Create a timeless treasure that celebrates your child’s imagination.
starting_at_999_sek_for_a_photobook_with: Starting at 999/- SEK for a PhotoBook with 24 drawings.
shipping_charges_will_be_charged_extra_o: Shipping charges will be charged extra on this price.
